document.full_text: israeli police have arrested two palestinian teenagers on suspicion of stabbing to death a jewish couple and three of their children while they slept in a west bank settlement, a police spokesman said on sunday.
document.title: israel holds 2 palestinians over settlement killings
lines_and_colors: israeli police have arrested two palestinian teenagers on suspicion of stabbing to death a jewish couple and three of their children while they slept in a west bank settlement, a police spokesman said on sunday.
